00028 #ifndef V8_V8_PROFILER_H_
00029 #define V8_V8_PROFILER_H_
00030 
00031 #include "v8.h"
00032 
00033 #ifdef _WIN32
00034 // Setup for Windows DLL export/import. See v8.h in this directory for
00035 // information on how to build/use V8 as a DLL.
00036 #if defined(BUILDING_V8_SHARED) && defined(USING_V8_SHARED)
00037 #error both BUILDING_V8_SHARED and USING_V8_SHARED are set - please check the\
00038   build configuration to ensure that at most one of these is set
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #ifdef BUILDING_V8_SHARED
00042 #define V8EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00043 #elif USING_V8_SHARED
00044 #define V8EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00045 #else
00046 #define V8EXPORT
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #else  // _WIN32
00050 
00051 // Setup for Linux shared library export. See v8.h in this directory for
00052 // information on how to build/use V8 as shared library.
00053 #if defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ >= 4) && defined(V8_SHARED)
00054 #define V8EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00055 #else  // defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ >= 4)
00056 #define V8EXPORT
00057 #endif  // defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ >= 4)
00058 
00059 #endif  // _WIN32

00194 class V8EXPORT HeapGraphEdge {
00195  public:
00196   enum Type {
00197     CONTEXT_VARIABLE = 0,  // A variable from a function context.
00198     ELEMENT = 1,           // An element of an array.
00199     PROPERTY = 2,          // A named object property.
00200     INTERNAL = 3           // A link that can't be accessed from JS,
00201                            // thus, its name isn't a real property name.
00202   };
00203 
00205   Type GetType() const;
00206 
00211   Handle<Value> GetName() const;
00212 
00214   const HeapGraphNode* GetFromNode() const;
00215 
00217   const HeapGraphNode* GetToNode() const;
00218 };
00219

00240 class V8EXPORT HeapGraphNode {
00241  public:
00242   enum Type {
00243     INTERNAL = 0,   // Internal node, a virtual one, for housekeeping.
00244     ARRAY = 1,      // An array of elements.
00245     STRING = 2,     // A string.
00246     OBJECT = 3,     // A JS object (except for arrays and strings).
00247     CODE = 4,       // Compiled code.
00248     CLOSURE = 5     // Function closure.
00249   };
00250 
00252   Type GetType() const;
00253 
00259   Handle<String> GetName() const;
00260 
00262   int GetSelfSize() const;
00263 
00265   int GetTotalSize() const;
00266 
00271   int GetPrivateSize() const;
00272 
00274   int GetChildrenCount() const;
00275 
00277   const HeapGraphEdge* GetChild(int index) const;
00278 
00280   int GetRetainersCount() const;
00281 
00283   const HeapGraphEdge* GetRetainer(int index) const;
00284 
00286   int GetRetainingPathsCount() const;
00287 
00289   const HeapGraphPath* GetRetainingPath(int index) const;
00290 };
